text: Does anyone have any clean “search” wisdom for utilizing the HubSpot API to search the website?
^ <@U26AKMZ19> may be able to help or point you in the right direction

<@U25C65C3S> I'm personally not too sure on this one. I don't have a ton of experience with the API.  It might be worth adding this in the designers forum though as someone may have found a way to accomplish this (<https://inbound.org/group/HubSpot-designer-forum>).

Hey everyone - thank you for coming to the first Developer Day yesterday. I just sent out an email about this, but in case Slack is easier… We would love your feedback from yesterday. If you have a minute, mind taking this survey? <https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/DeveloperDay>
great stuff at dev day, Jeff. already filled out survey. Deep dive tech stuff was really good, but the workflow and process stuff I thought was even more valuable.
Thanks for the feedback, Nate. I appreciate it.
We'd love to keep this community going here on Slack -- so feel free to continue to post questions and chat with everyone.
